reference.title: cxxEnumeratorNameLookup
reference.shortdesc: Provides a unique identifier of the enumerator.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumeratorNameLookup> element provides a way of uniquely identifying an enumerator in a body of DITA XML that describes a body of C++ source code.

The free format PCDATA text in this element should:
be unique within a set of DITA XML files.
be human readable.
follow the lookup techniques use in the C++ standard (ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E)).
use a reversible encoding.
